title: Grand Theft Auto: Chinatown Wars
headline: Grand Theft Auto: Chinatown Wars
subtitle: Scan the QR Code to Download
content:
Grand Theft Auto: Chinatown Wars has been optimized for mobile devices with highly customizable touchscreen controls, physical controller support, adjusted difficulty levels, and more.

Scan the QR Code to learn how to play Grand Theft Auto: Chinatown Wars on your mobile device for free as part of your GTA+ Membership.
